```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> cpx.red_led = True
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> cpx.pixels.brightness = 1.0
>>> cpx.pixels[0] = (255, 0, 0)
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> RGB = dict(black=0x000000, blue=0x0000FF, green=0x00FF00, 
... cyan=0x00FFFF,
... red=0xFF0000, magenta=0xFF00FF, yellow=0xFFFF00, 
... white=0xFFFFFF)
>>> cpx.pixels[0] = RGB['red']
```

```py
>>> for i, name in enumerate(sorted(RGB)):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = RGB[name]
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx

>>> randint(0, 255)
186
>>> randint(0, 255)
84
```

```py
>>> def get_random_color():
...     return (randint(0, 255), randint(0, 255), randint(0, 255))
...     
...     
... 
>>> get_random_color()
(208, 161, 71)
>>> get_random_color()
(96, 126, 158)
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> from random import randint
>>> import time
>>> def get_random_color():
...     return (randint(0, 255), randint(0, 255), randint(0, 255))
...          
... 
>>> get_random_color()
(10, 41, 10)
```

```py
>>> for i in range(10):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = get_random_color()
...     time.sleep(1)
...     
...     
... 
>>> 
```

```py
>>> cpx.pixels.fill(0x000000)
>>> for cycle in range(3):
...     for i in range(10):
...         cpx.pixels[i] = get_random_color()
...         time.sleep(1)
...         
...         
... 
>>> 
```

```py
>>> cpx.pixels.fill(0x000000)
>>> for i in range(5):
...     cpx.pixels.fill(get_random_color())
...     time.sleep(1)
...     
...     
... 
>>> 
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> import time
```

```py
>>> RAINBOW = [
... 0xFF0000,   # red
... 0xFFA500,   # orange
... 0xFFFF00,   # yellow
... 0x00FF00,   # green
... 0x0000FF,   # blue
... 0x4b0082,   # indigo
... 0xEE82EE,   # violet
... ]
>>> 
```

```py
>>> for i, color in enumerate(RAINBOW):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = color
...     time.sleep(0.2)
...     
...     
... 
>>> 
```

```py
>>> for i in range(len(RAINBOW)):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = 0x000000
...     time.sleep(0.2)
...     
...     
... 
>>> 
```

```py
from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx import time RAINBOW = [ 0xFF0000, # red 
 0xFFA500, # orange 
 0xFFFF00, # yellow 
 0x00FF00, # green 
 0x0000FF, # blue 
 0x4b0082, # indigo 
 0xEE82EE, # violet
]

cpx.pixels.brightness = 0.10
cpx.pixels.fill(0x000000)
while True:
    for i, color in enumerate(RAINBOW):
        cpx.pixels[i] = color
        time.sleep(0.2)
    for i in range(len(RAINBOW)):
        cpx.pixels[i] = 0x000000
        time.sleep(0.2)
```
